text.text: The Shortbow is a fast and nimble option for ranged combat. It fires faster than its vanilla brother and also allows for faster movement, however this comes with the price of reduced damage.
If you're looking to turn your enemies into a pincushion, then the shortbow is for you.

properties: Can be used with vanilla arrows
